nz.ac.auckland.ptjava.editors
Class PTJavaTextTools

java.lang.Object
  nz.ac.auckland.ptjava.editors.PTJavaTextTools

public class PTJavaTextTools
extends java.lang.Object

The tools required to configure a PTJava text viewer. Provides a Java partition scanner and methods for setting up document partitions.

This class may be instantiated; it is not intended to be sub-classed.

Constructor Summary
PTJavaTextTools()
          The Constructor.
 
Method Summary

          Factory method for creating a Java-specific document partitioner using this object's partitions scanner.

          Disposes all the individual tools of this tools collection.
 org.eclipse.jface.text.rules.IPartitionTokenScanner getPartitionScanner()
          Returns a scanner which is configured to scan PTJava-specific partitions, which are multi-line comments, Javadoc comments, and regular Java source code.
 void setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner(org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument document)

Method Detail

dispose

public void dispose()
Disposes all the individual tools of this tools collection.

getPartitionScanner

public org.eclipse.jface.text.rules.IPartitionTokenScanner getPartitionScanner()
Returns a scanner which is configured to scan PTJava-specific partitions, which are multi-line comments, Javadoc comments, and regular Java source code.

Returns:
a Java partition scanner

createDocumentPartitioner

public org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocumentPartitioner createDocumentPartitioner()
Factory method for creating a Java-specific document partitioner using this object's partitions scanner. This method is a convenience method.

Returns:
a newly created Java document partitioner

setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner

public void setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner(org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument document)
Sets up the Java document partitioner for the given document for the default partitioning. Equivalent to setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner(IDocument, String).

Parameters:
document - the document to be set up
Since:
3.0

setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner

public void setupPTJavaDocumentPartitioner(org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument document,
                                           java.lang.String partitioning)
Sets up the PTJava document partitioner for the given document for the given partitioning.

Parameters:
document - the document to be set up
partitioning - the document partitioning
Since:
3.0
